channel.title: Short Command Npcreset!
channel.description:
hey could someone give me the code for a Npc Reset on PI. Cuz my server doesnt have it and im sure the delta version of npcreset aint work (i gues)
Thank you! Youridudock

item.title: Short Command Npcreset!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Wintercanon:

I’ve never looked at the source code of Project Insanity but I’m pretty sure this would be as easy as setting a boolean or calling a method… Make a new command switch, if statement or however you server handles commands and set the reset boolean to true or call a method to reset the npcs. I’m not sure how your server operates.

Mhhh K

Read full topic
